text: The Misadventures of Sheriff Lobo is a NBC action comedy series that aired from 18 September, 1979 to 5 May, 1981. It was a spin-off from the television series B. J. and the Bear. It starred Claude Akins, Mills Watson, Brian Kerwin, Leann Hunley, Dennis Burkley and Nell Carter. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1979 American television series debuts Category:1981 American television series endings Category:NBC network series
title: The Misadventures of Sheriff Lobo
